SEARCH
Package core

Class AccountManager

java.lang.Object
core.AccountManager
public class AccountManager extends Object
Manages the creation, linking, and validation of accounts. This class interacts with the DataManager to persist and retrieve account information.
Author:
Siyuan Lu

    Constructs an AccountManager with the specified DataManager.
